title: Esbuild Build Configuration
description: Defines optional options for Esbuild build.

$schema.description: Part of the JSON Schema standard, this optional keyword declares the URL of the schema that the file conforms to. Editors may download the schema and use it to perform syntax highlighting.

extends.description: Optionally specifies another JSON config file that this file extends from.  This provides a way for standard settings to be shared across multiple projects.

builds.description: The array of builds that Esbuild should run

entryPoints.description: The array of entrypoints that Esbuild should compile

outdir.description: The output directory for the build

outbase.description: The output base for the build, see https://esbuild.github.io/api/#outbase

bundle.description: If true, compile the entrypoints to bundles

target.description: The target environment for generated code, see https://esbuild.github.io/api/#target

format.description: The output format for generated code: https://esbuild.github.io/api/#format
